long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocks all websites unless you are running the timer.  You get 3 rations every day, each 25 minutes.  After you've used up all your rations, you can only surf in 1-minute intervals.

I wrote this for myself to ration my web surfing to an hour and a half per day.

This is now slightly less betas.  The source is at:
https://github.com/marcpickett1/webrationtimer

This was adapted from Strict Workflow by matchu.
